title: New: TruthCity – Changes
body:
Love the Kendrick influence on this new track from NY rapper **TruthCity**.

Reciting the story of his move from Virginia to New York, and the day to day struggle to make ends meet, it’s brutally honest and all the more endearing for it. _Changes_ is lifted from his debut album, The Prologue, out now.

excerpt.full: Love the Kendrick influence on this new track from NY rapper TruthCity. Reciting the story of his move from Virginia to New York, and the day to day struggle to make ends meet, it’s brutally honest and all the more endearing for it. Changes is lifted from his debut album, The Prologue, out now.
excerpt.short: Love the Kendrick influence on this new track from NY rapper TruthCity.
